other_tests.findings: The gallbladder appears to be mildly distended with thickening of the gallbladder wall measuring 0.4 cm, small amount of pericholecystic fluid, and is filled with sludge and small stones. The liver is mildly heterogeneous and echogenic but has a smooth contour with no focal liver lesions concerning for malignancy. No intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation; common bile duct is normal measuring 0.3 cm.
